remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何抑制指令碼錯誤，並顯示您自己的自訂對話方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 這個程式碼範例需要您的應用程式主機控制項，名為`webBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#451)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#451)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`如果您想要顯示您自己的自訂錯誤訊息給使用者，或完全隱藏發生的錯誤。Set this property to `true` if you wish to display your own custom error message to the user, or suppress the error entirely. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何抑制指令碼錯誤，並顯示您自己的自訂對話方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 這個程式碼範例需要您的應用程式主機控制項，名為`webBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/CS/Form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlWindow/VB/Form1.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您主控包含框架的 HTML 文件，它可能不明顯的框架會負責產生錯誤。If you are hosting an HTML document that contains frames, it might not be evident which frame is responsible for generating the error. 使用這個屬性來提供偵錯資訊，讓開發人員可以進一步縮小問題。Use this property to provide debugging information so that a developer can better narrow down the problem. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#451)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#451)]
